remarks: When the image set is open, the quotient map satisfies a partial converse to ~ fnfvima , which is normally only true for injective functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
statement:
kqval.2 $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> { y e. J | x e. y } ) $.
kqfvima $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ U e. J /\ A e. X ) -> ( A e. U <-> ( F ` A ) e. ( F " U ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d x y $.
